column1: '''A Conspiracy Unmasked''' is the fifth chapter of the first book in ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.

column2: Frodo]] had told his companions that he had been moving to [[Crickhollow]] to live. As they reached this destination, Frodo realized that his companions had known all along that he had to dispose of the [[The One Ring
column3: Ring]] and they were committed to helping him. [[Meriadoc Brandybuck
column5: Pippin]] had already decided to accompany Frodo to [[Rivendell]]. They agreed that it was better to go through the [[Old Forest]] than the road. [[Fatty Bolger
column6: Fatty Bolger]] was to stay behind to keep a normal appearance, so that others would think Frodo was living at Crickhollow. They retired for the night and Frodo dreamt that he was struggling to climb a tall tower near the seaside.
